turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: hello, how can i assist you?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hi. Can you help me order pizzas from Bella Luna Pizzeria, please?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: sure, how many pizzas do you want to order?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Can I get four small pizzas, all four thin crust?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: okay and what are the toppings?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: One pizza, can I get a barbecue sauce with chicken?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: The second, can I get a black color and pineapple pizza?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: The third one, can I get a Hawaiian pizza?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: And the fourth, can I get a four-cheese pizza?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: did you say cheese pizza for the last one?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: four-cheese pizza.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: any other special instruction?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: That's about it.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: so your order is: 4 small thin crust pizzas. one chicken bbq, the second with black olives and pineapple, the third is a hawaiian and the fourth is a 4 cheese pizza, correct?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: That is correct.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, the total is $43.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Okay, that's perfect.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: your pizzas will be ready for pickup at bella luna's soon.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Okay, perfect.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: enjoy!

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Thank you.
